GRAPH_ADVANCED.title: Link Strength
GRAPH_ADVANCED.description: Defines the strength of the pulling force that links exert between nodes

GRAPH_ADVANCED.title: Charge Strength
GRAPH_ADVANCED.description: Defines the strength of the repulsive force that nodes exert on other nodes.

GRAPH_ADVANCED.title: Collision Radius
GRAPH_ADVANCED.description: Defines the perceived radius of nodes.

GRAPH_ADVANCED.title: Auto Space Nodes Option
GRAPH_ADVANCED.description: Spaces nodes based on label length, in order to help label readability.

GRAPH_MAIN.title: Node Labels
GRAPH_MAIN.description: Choose which property to label nodes by. Determined based on the current displayed nodes.

GRAPH_MAIN.title: Node Colors
GRAPH_MAIN.description: Choose which node properties to color nodes based on. Eligible properties are those with 20 or fewer different unique values throughout the displayed nodes.

GRAPH_MAIN.title: Collision Radius
GRAPH_MAIN.description: Defines the perceived radius of nodes.

GRAPH_MAIN.title: Auto Space Nodes Option
GRAPH_MAIN.description: Spaces nodes based on label length, in order to help label readability.
